security_audit.summary: This is a pure skill definition file (SKILL.md) containing only markdown documentation and AI instructions. No executable code is present. The described capabilities (git operations, gh CLI) match the stated purpose of GitHub PR automation. No network calls, file access beyond repository scope, or code execution patterns detected.

content.value_statement: Creating detailed Pull Request descriptions takes time and often gets skipped. This skill analyzes your changes automatically using git diff and log commands, then generates comprehensive PR descriptions with proper formatting, change categorization, and checklists.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes git changes with diff, log, and status commands
Generates comprehensive PR descriptions with templates
Creates GitHub PRs using gh CLI with proper formatting
Validates branch and commit status before PR creation
Pushes changes to remote and retrieves PR URL
limitations: Requires gh CLI to be installed and authenticated
Requires qa-check to be run before PR creation
Does not create branches or commit changes

prompt_templates.title: Basic PR creation
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the create-pr skill to generate and push a Pull Request for my current changes. The PR title should summarize the main change.

prompt_templates.title: PR with issue reference
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a PR that closes issue #123. Use the create-pr skill and make sure to include 'closes #123' in the title.

prompt_templates.title: Feature branch PR
prompt_templates.prompt: Run create-pr skill for my feature branch. The changes include backend API updates and a new frontend component.

prompt_templates.title: Documentation update PR
prompt_templates.prompt: Use create-pr to create a PR for the documentation updates I made in the documents folder.

faq.question: What tools do I need installed?
faq.answer: Git and GitHub CLI (gh) must be installed and authenticated with 'gh auth login'.

faq.question: Can I customize the PR template?
faq.answer: The skill uses a built-in template. You can modify SKILL.md to customize sections.

faq.question: Does this create commits?
faq.answer: No, this skill only analyzes existing commits and creates PRs. Commit creation is separate.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only reads git metadata and uses gh CLI. No data is sent externally.

faq.question: What if PR creation fails?
faq.answer: The skill provides error guidance for authentication issues, merge conflicts, and branch problems.

faq.question: How is this different from manual PR creation?
faq.answer: It automates change analysis, categorization, and template population for consistent PRs.
